oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Maslak al-sadād ilá masʼalat khalq afʻāl al-ʻibād / taḥrīr ʻAbd Allāh Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan ibn Shihāb al-Dīn al-Kurdī al-Kūrānī al-Shahrazūrī al-Shahrānī thumma al-Madanī : manuscript, 1684
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kūrānī, Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan , 1616 or 1617-approximately 1690
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 21 lines per page, in black and red.
Cream laid paper with watermarks. 21.3 x 15.1 cm. (15.3 x 9 cm.).
بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم وبه اياه نستعين الحمد لله الفتاح العليم الغني الجداد الحكيم وافضل الصلاة... :Incipit
Bound with flap. Boards covered with paper with brown leather on spine and on fore-edge flap.
According to the colophon (f. 26r), copy completed on 17 Ramaḍān 1095 AH [August 27, 1684 AD].
With: Imdād dhawī al-istiʻdād li-sulūk maslak al-sadād / taḥrīr ʻAbd Allāh Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan ibn Shihāb al-Dīn al-Kurdī al-Kūrānī (ff. 26v-74r).
MS Arab 251. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islam--Doctrines
Hadith
Shafiites
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: مسلك السداد إلى مسألة خلق أفعال العباد / تحرير عبد الله إبراهيم بن حسن بن شهاب الدين الكردي الكوراني الشهرزوري الشهراني ثم المدني : مخطوطة، 1684
